CustomField.formula: CASE( UPPER( BillingCountry ), 'INDIA', 'IN', 'PAKISTAN','PAK', 'Afghanistan', 'AFG', 'Albania', 'ALB', 'Algeria','DZ', 'United States of America', 'US', 'Turkey', 'TR', 'Thailand', 'TH', 'Switzerland', 'CH', 'Sri Lanka', 'LK', 'South Africa', 'ZA', 'Qatar', 'QA', null)
CustomField.label: Country Code
